mapper.select: select `Quantity` from `dsms_partsInst` as pi left join `dsms_parts` as p on pi.partsId = p.id where `partsId` = #{id};
select count(*) from `dsms_parts` as p left join `dsms_department` as d on p.partsDepartment = d.id where `partsCode` = #{partsCode};

select p.partsCode, p.partsName, pi.quantity, po.positionName, a.areaName from `dsms_partsinst` as pi left join `dsms_parts` as p on pi.partsId = p.id left join `dsms_position` as po on pi.positionId = po.id left join `dsms_area` as a on a.id = po.positionArea where `partsId` = #{partsId} and `statusId` = #{statusId};
